articles.author: Scroll Staff
articles.title: Supreme Court quashes FIR filed against actor Priya Prakash Varrier for winking in a film
articles.description: The top court said the song ‘Manikya Malaraaya Poovi’ was not blasphemous and rebuked the petitioners for filing the case.

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Idea-Vodafone say merger complete, now India's largest telco with 408 million active users
articles.description: The new combine has displaced Bharti Airtel which has held the top spot in India for some 15 years.

articles.title: Asian Games 2018 Live Updates Day 13: Women's Squash Team Stuns Malaysia To Reach Final – NDTV Sports
articles.description: 2018 Asian Games Live: The Indian women's squash team stunned Malaysia to reach the final.

articles.title: Voting underway in Karnataka civic polls - Times of India
articles.description: BENGALURU: Moderate polling is underway for the election to 102 Urban Local Bodies (ULBs) across Karnataka, a poll official said on Friday.

articles.title: Delhi special court grants bail to Rabri Devi, Tejashwi Yadav in IRCTC land scam case, asks Lalu to present himself - Firstpost
articles.description: A special court in Delhi has granted bail to RJD chief Lalu Prasad Yadav's wife Rabri Devi and son Tejashwi Yadav in the Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) land scam case.

articles.title: Article 35A row LIVE updates: Supreme Court adjourns case until after Jammu and Kashmir panchayat polls LIVE News, Latest Updates, Live blog, Highlights and Live coverage - Firstpost
articles.description: Article 35A hearing LIVE updates: The Supreme Court adjourned the case after Centre argued that the local body elections are long overdue in the state and Article 35A remains an emotive issue in the Valley. The apex court granted the request and postponed the…

articles.title: State funeral for Nandamuri Harikrishna at Jubilee Hills crematorium | Hyderabad NYOOOZ
articles.description: HYDERABAD: Thousands of people, including family members, celebrities and politicians from both the Telugu states bid a tearful adieu to Nandamuri Harikrishna on Thursday.His last rites were performed with full state honours at Mahaprasthanam in Jubilee Hills…

articles.title: Flood alert in parts of Arunachal Pradesh, Assam
articles.description: Flood alert has been issued in low-lying areas nearing the Siang/ Brahmaputra river in Arunachal Pradesh and Assam after 9020 cumec of water was discharged into Tsangpo river by China on Thursday.

articles.title: 55 lakh affected by floods: House
